message.content:
1. The primary outcome includes postoperative length of hospital stay.
2. The primary outcome also includes long-term global health-related quality of life.
3. The long-term global health-related quality of life is measured one year postoperatively.

messages.content:
Statement: The primary outcome were 1,postoperative length of hospital stay (LOS) and 2. long-term global health-related quality of life (HRQoL) one year postoperatively.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
